vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.15
§ Galal = "influential"
1) a Levite, one of the sons of Asaph
2) a third Levite, son of Jeduthun
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1a)   estiércol; (1b)   a cuenta de; (2a)   levita; post exílico; (2b)   hijo de Jedutún; ancestro de Abdías, Abdá, levita
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
加拉 或 迦拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "有影響的,施以影響的;有權勢的 "
1) 利未人, 亞薩的後裔
2) 利未人, 耶杜頓的兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
加拉 或 迦拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "有影响的,施以影响的;有权势的 "
1) 利未人, 亚萨的后裔
2) 利未人, 耶杜顿的儿子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.16;
son of: Jeduthun (H3038H);
father of: Shemaiah (H8098F)
§ Galal = "influential"
1) a Levite, one of the sons of Asaph
2) a third Levite, son of Jeduthun
